          <title>
            <string language="en">Rayon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rayon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rayon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rayon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνητή μέταξα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rayón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that rayon is made with the use of an alkali substance, sodium hydroxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rayon</string>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Rayon mit dem 
Gebrauch einer Alkalisubstanz gebildet wird, Natriumhydroxid.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la rayonne est 
faite avec l'utilisation d'une substance d'alcali, hydroxyde de 
sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o rayon está feito 
com o uso de uma substância do alcalóide, hydroxide do sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il rayon è fatto
con l'uso di una sostanza dell'alcali, idrossido del sodio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η τεχνητή μέταξα 
γίνεται με τη χρήση μιας αλκαλικής ουσίας, υδροξείδιο νατρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el rayón está 
hecho con el uso de una sustancia del álcali, hidróxido del sodio.</string>
          </description>
